snippet: The beverage maker and the fast-food chain have had close ties since 1955, to the point where Coca-Cola even has a McDonald’s division.
abstract: McDonald's is Coca-Cola's largest restaurant customer, and the two companies maintain a unique, symbiotic relationship that dates back to 1955.
lead_paragraph: The beverage maker and the fast-food chain have had close ties since 1955, to the point where Coca-Cola even has a McDonald’s division.

headline.main: Coke and McDonald’s, Growing Together Since 1955
headline.print_headline: Coke and McDonald’s, Growing Together Since 1955
